resources.string: This is just a simulation of a bowling game. The result of each shot is generated randomly.\nA game consists of 10 frames per bowler and one extra shot if needed. For each frame, a bowler has 2 shots.\nNotes: The result is strike when a player knocks down all 10 pins in the first shot of a frame. In this situation, the score of that frame is 10 + the number of pins knocked down within the next 2 shots. The result is spare when a bowler knocks down all 10 pins using both shots of the same frame. In this situation, the score for that frame is 10 + the number of pins knocked down during the next shot.
